oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photograph of Homer Geiger and J. J. Peltz
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Photograph of two soldiers in uniform standing in front of wooden building. The soldier on the left has two overseas chevrons on his lower left sleeve and a single chevron on his lower right, indicating that he was wounded in combat. The hand writing on the reverse describes Geiger as a musician of the "Fish Horn juggler" and the other as "Trombone 'Artist'". Homer Geiger served in Btry. B, 114th Field Art., 30th Div. Btry. B consisted of men from the Chattanooga area.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Geiger, Homer; Peltz, J. J.
